title: Cross-Lecture Search
summary: Search across all lecture transcripts to find where specific topics were discussed
why: When studying for exams, need to find everywhere a concept was mentioned across multiple lectures. Currently would have to manually search each transcript.
flow: Global search bar ‚Üí type topic ‚Üí see results from all lectures with timestamps and snippets ‚Üí click to jump to that point in any recording.
implementation: Build search index of all transcripts. Could use vector embeddings for semantic search or simple full-text for v1. Results grouped by lecture with timestamp links.
ux: Search box in lecture dashboard header. As you type, dropdown shows matching results across all courses/lectures. Click result ‚Üí opens that recording at the relevant timestamp.
